data.title: $62k USD reward offered for WikiLeaks to obtain and publish secret Trans-Pacific Partnership Argeement 12 nation internet-trade deal
Mexico Mayor killed for 'standing up to drugs cartel'
U.S., Israel lose UNESCO voting rights
Myanmar is preparing to adopt the Metric system, leaving USA and Liberia as the only two countries failing to metricate.

Supreme Court of Canada finds gov't must get distinct warrant to search a computer found with a search warrant: "It is difficult to imagine a more intrusive invasion of privacy than the search of a personal or home computer."

German Trust in United States Plummets "The NSA spying scandals have taken a toll on Germans' opinion of their longtime ally, according to a new survey. Mistrust in the United States has skyrocketed, and more Germans are viewing whistleblower Edward Snowden as a hero."
A Proposal To Limit Swiss Executive Pay To 12 Times That Of Low-Paid Employees Has Fat Cats Worried
Video emerging from The Philippines as Typhoon Haiyan comes ashore with winds reaching 378 km/h.

Snowden persuaded other NSA workers to give up passwords
